statements: DELETE FROM video_archives WHERE video_id = 1 AND video_title = 'Sample Video';
DELETE FROM video_archives WHERE video_id = 100 AND genre = 'Action';
DELETE FROM production_schedules WHERE production_date < '2022-11-30' AND production_type = 'Movie';
DELETE FROM video_archives WHERE video_id = 1001 AND upload_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM production_schedules WHERE producer = 'John Doe' AND production_date > '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM multimedia_production_company WHERE company_name = 'ABC Productions';
DELETE FROM BroadcastLogs WHERE log_date < '2022-01-01' AND broadcast_duration > 60;
